meanings.sent1: The roue spent his nights partying and drinking excessively.
meanings.sent2: She was warned to stay away from the roue who frequented the local bar.
meanings.sent3: The roue thought he was the life of the party, but others saw him as a troublemaker.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a roue preceded him wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The roue's wild behavior was the talk of the town.

meanings.sent1: The rusty roue on the old cart creaked as it turned.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic replaced the broken roue on the bicycle.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chased its tail in circles, like a roue in motion.
meanings.sent4: The roue of fate turned, bringing unexpected changes to their lives.
meanings.sent5: The roue of the watermill spun gracefully in the breeze.
